strategy: Introduce a deep neural network (DNN) with an embedding layer for categorical variables and a dense layer stack for continuous features, using feature-wise linear transformations to capture non-linear interactions. Apply batch normalization and dropout to prevent overfitting, and use a learning rate scheduler during training. Preprocess continuous features with quantile normalization to improve stability in gradient descent.
